/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, divided into multiple lanes by white lines, is filled with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the sides of the street, adding to the city's architectural diversity. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds visible in the distance. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of scale to the scene.
